tool_description: Track dividend payouts. Lookup dividend payout history by ticker. Receive alerts for upcoming ex-dividend date.
title: DividendTracker

api_list.name: Payout history
api_list.description: Get dividend payout history for a ticker
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dividendtracker1.p.rapidapi.com/history/{ticker}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dividendtracker1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
